name: AS_GCM_StyledTextEditorForFillInsEnabled_v1_default
sail_code:
/*

DESCRIPTION: This rule represents the ability to use the styled text editor to complete single line or multiline fill-ins to complete fill-ins in a clause set.

DEFAULT BEHAVIOR: The styled text editor will be used to complete fill-ins in a clause set.

CUSTOMIZATION STEPS: 
1. Replace true with false if the styledTextEditorField() should be disabled
2. the value of this expression should only be one of the two available below
{true,false}

EXPECTED OUTPUT TYPE: Boolean with the value of true or false

TITLE: Enable/Diable Styled Text Editor for Fill-in Wizard

*/
true
